title: Catch-22
author: Joseph Heller
description: Set in Italy during World War II, this is the story of the incomparable, malingering bombardier, Yossarian, a hero who is furious because thousands of people he has never met are trying to kill him. B

title: The Way of Kings
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: The result of over ten years of planning, writing, and world-building, The Way of Kings is but the opening movement of the Stormlight Archive, a bold masterpiece in the making.

title: Meditations
author: Marcus Aurelius
description: Meditations is a series of personal writings by Marcus Aurelius, Roman Emperor 161â€“180 CE, setting forth his ideas on Stoic philosophy.

title: Green Eggs and Ham
author: Dr. Seuss
description: I do not like green eggs and ham.

title: The Big Poo Hullabaloo
author: Ann Waldon-Schmid
description: Where oh where is the best place to poo? Join Little Lou on this silly, charming adventure that concludes with a successful trip to the potty! Lighthearted and fun this book teaches young children about potty training using cheerful rhyming language, vivid illustrations and lively characters.

title: The Idiot
author: Elif Batuman
description: The year is 1995, and email is new. Selin, the daughter of Turkish immigrants, arrives for her freshman year at Harvard. She signs up for classes in subjects she has never heard of, befriends her char

title: Shit, Actually
author: Lindy West
description: Shit, Actually is a love letter and a break-up note all in one: to the films that shaped us and the ones that ruined us. More often than not, Lindy finds, they're one and the same.
